justification: B wants stable floors, workhorse touches, and avoids injury. Harris offers some floor but is still a committee back; Scott is volatile. B also values targets and would lose its only TE with a high target share (Noah Brown), creating a roster hole and lowering floor. A already has a healthy Tier 2 TE (Darian Taylor), so the ‘weak TE’ claim is dubious and the upgrade is lateral. The rationale is brief and ignores roster construction, bye/usage details, and B’s conservative priorities.
